snippet: Officials in the Sakha-Yakutia region of Siberia have gone so far as to declare a state of emergency to draw attention to the wolves eating livestock, including horses and reindeer.
abstract: Wolf populations are growing out of control in Sakha-Yakutia region of Siberia, eating livestock and leading to demand for hunters.
lead_paragraph: Officials in the Sakha-Yakutia region of Siberia have gone so far as to declare a state of emergency to draw attention to the wolves eating livestock, including horses and reindeer.

headline.seo: Wolf Population Draws Hunters in Siberia
headline.main: Siberia Is Thick With Wolves, and Hunters Are in Demand
headline.print_headline: Siberia Is Thick With Wolves, And Hunters Are in Demand
